Splattercannon:
 
The large Minion heard the transmission and hurried to the meeting area.  
'What is going on now?' he thought as he ran in.  
"What's this about Nightstrike?"

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:

Unicron:

Unicron opened his com link to some of his minions and 
said "Scattershot, Nightsrike... Report!!!! "


NightStrike Ran towards the meeting room and waited for Scattershot
